FuncDef: The password command configures a password for a local access user. The password command configures a password for a local access user. By default, the password of a local access user is empty. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the password of a local access user.
The value is a string of 8 to 128 case-sensitive characters in plaintext or a string of 128 to 268 case-sensitive characters in ciphertext. The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed in double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo: If no password is configured when a local access user is created, the password is empty, and the local access user cannot log in to the device.
